scenes.text: You gun the truck through the barricade and carve a path into open highway. Behind you, the quarantine line collapses as your crew escapes alive.
You endure decontamination in freezing floodlight glare and stagger into a guarded safe zone. The city is lost, but your crew still breathes.
Your foot slips on wet concrete. The scream is brief, then swallowed by the roar of the horde.
